sentences.en: A constant threat of unemployment hangs over thousands of university researchers.
sentences.cn: 持续存在的失业威胁困扰着数千名大学科研人员。

By far the most important issue for them is unemployment.
sentences.cn: 对他们来说最重要的无疑就是失业问题。

sentences.en: Closure of the plant means 80 workers are facing unemployment.
sentences.cn: 这家工厂的关闭意味着 80 个工人面临失业。

sentences.en: He expects the unemployment figures to rise even higher in coming months.
sentences.cn: 他预计失业人数会在今后几个月里进一步攀升。

sentences.en: I think that the underlying problem is education, unemployment and bad housing.
sentences.cn: 我认为深层的问题在于教育、失业和糟糕的住房条件。

sentences.en: In 1986 more than three million were receiving unemployment benefit.

sentences.en: Many people took second jobs as a safeguard against unemployment.
sentences.cn: 许多人为防失业都干两份工作。

sentences.en: No one disputes the direct linkage between the unemployment rate and crime.
sentences.cn: 谁都不会质疑失业率与犯罪之间存在直接联系。

sentences.en: Officials tussled over who had responsibility for the newly fashionable unemployment agenda.
sentences.cn: 众官员为谁负责最近备受关注的失业议题一事争得不可开交。

sentences.en: Swiss unemployment rose to the still modest rate of 0.7%.
sentences.cn: 瑞士的失业率上升到了0.7%，这个百分比仍然不算太高。

sentences.en: The nation's unemployment rate has been climbing steadily since last June.
sentences.cn: 自去年6月以来，该国的失业率一直在不断上升。

sentences.cn: 失业率上升，相对应的是生产率进一步提高。

sentences.en: There have been record bankruptcies and remorselessly rising unemployment.
sentences.cn: 破产案数量达到最高纪录，失业率持续上升。

sentences.en: They demanded a more expansionary economy to combat rising unemployment.
sentences.cn: 他们要求发展扩张性的经济以应对升高的失业率。

sentences.en: Unemployment in Britain rose to 8.1% of the labour force.
sentences.cn: 英国的失业人数已上升至占劳动力总数的8.1％。

sentences.en: Unemployment is now a whisker away from three million.
sentences.cn: 现在的失业人数已接近300万。
